wikipedia_page.main: Catherine Jane Hamilton (1841–1935)  was an author and journalist who also wrote under the pen name, Retlaw Spring.

response: The magazine had high production values, with regular illustrations and sometimes sheet music. It gave early encouragement to Thomas Moore.  According to Tom Clyde, "very little of the creative writing is worth reading"; it often featured Orientalism and rarely Romanticism. Much of the non-Irish material was reprinted from the European Magazine.  In 1883 C. J. Hamilton wrote:
*C. J. Hamilton (1841–1935, England/Ireland), pw., poet & ch. wr.
